column1: (c) It must  be  either the  produce  of  property  or/and  the  reward  of  labour
(d) It must not be a mere change in the form of, or accretion to, the value

column2: of articles in which it is not the business of the taxpayer to deal; and

column1: (e) It must not be a sum returned as a reduction of a private expense.
